page.title: 12 LOCAL VIEWS OF THE VILLAGE
page.content: Middleton Stoney is a very quiet and relaxed village with a friendly atmosphere.The only bone of contention is the heavy traffic on the main road.Local residents remember the time when cricket and football were played on the same road with occasional interuptions by a car. The older residents have moved to the council bungalows from the older estate houses, these have now been purchased by commuters and weekenders.These bungalows are modern and much safer for the older residents.Many of whom are old and unfirm. Many of the properties vacated are now occupied by weekenders especially from London and this gives the village a deserted look during the week. Clock Court is a converted stable area with three permanent residents.
